pageProduct.name: Alpha Keri Aloe Soothe Gentle Wash 1 Litre
pageProduct.description:
General Information

An extra-gentle, hydrating & soothing skin lotion, suitable for very dry, irritated & sensitive skin. Containing Organic Aloe Vera, high in Vitamin A, B12, C & E + Omega & Amino acids - which provide clinical benefit in hydrating, calming &  restoring skin.

Warnings

For external use only. If irritation develops, discontinue use.

Store below 30oC

Common Uses

An extra-gentle, hydrating and soothing all over body lotion

Ingredients

Water, Glycerin, Glycine Soja Oil, Isopropyl Palmitate, Cetearyl Ethylhexanoate, Dimethicone, Cetearyl Alcohol, Sodium Polyacrylate, Cetearyl Glucoside, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Powder, Hydroxyacetophenone, Phenoxyethanol, Disodium EDTA, Octadecyl Di-T-Butyl-4-Hydroxyhydrocinnamate

Directions

Apply to wet skin and lather gently. Rinse.
